cast.overview: A young woman's marriage to a charming prince turns into a fierce fight for survival when she's offered up as a sacrifice to a fire-breathing dragon.
cast.title: Damsel

details.biography: Sam Sharma is an English actor of Indian descent. Born in Augsburg, Sam spent the most of his childhood and early teenage years growing up in Germany. His first glimpse into the world of stage and film was after being approached by a talent agent during his time in Los Angeles. Later on he enrolled to a drama school in London to pursue a professional career in acting. Brought up in a fully multilingual home, he speaks fluent English, German, Hindi & Punjabi.
details.name: Sam Sharma
